availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Jeremiah Donovan and Martha Donovan. Married to Amanda Williams Donovan in Mercer County, Kentucky in June 1854. Father of Juda Donovan and David Donovan. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 335A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 566
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191861, p. 465
Find A Grave, "Cornelius Donovan (1822-1899)," Memorial #68083016, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/68083016 (accessed March 14, 2017).
